about_the_game:
Greetings, brave traveler of Odd! Ready your ears for a musical voyage unlike any other. The talented Matt Creamer has crafted the harmonies of this realm, enveloping you in melodies both familiar and unseen, including some hidden gems not shipped with the game itself.

Embark on an auditory quest through the lands of Odd Realm, and let the music be your guide. Each note is a step along an enchanting path, weaving a tale as rich and varied as the realm itself. Join us, and let the magic of the music awaken the adventurer within you!
